issue.title: improve the base layer management
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

In the V1, the base layer management is very complicated. There is two level of management. It would be nice to improve this management to get it more simple.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

I was wondering : should we have a generic base layer management in the CORE, then defined baselayers will be available for all modules (MAP, SHOP, etc...)

We noticed that it is a transversal need so we may put it in the CORE... but there are maybe some modules' specificity ?
